::Autofire/The Lavacons::

Autofire ducks under the shot, growling as the shadows of the two jets
pass over him on their pass at Surgital. He jumps into the air,
transforming into his alien vehicle mode. Flying up at top speed,
Autofire fires two laser shots at Composer before following one of the
Galactor jets. His scanners detect four more Alliance bots about to
arrive. This was not good.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Astral, Griplash, Recklessa, and Starlight see the CF and the battle
up ahead, speeding up so they could get there on time.



--- In nbwrpg@y..., "dcoburn" <1641coburn@h...> wrote:
> ::Composer/Cutthroat::
> 
>     Composer nodded, then fired 1 shot from his plasma rifle at
Autofire.
> 
>     "Feel the pain of music!" Composer taunted his own, unusual
taunt.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
>       Cutthroat was hit in the wing by half of Iris' shots, and the
last half missed when he flew up into the air.  Hovering by flapping
his wings, one which was damaged, he shot a stream of fire from his
mouth down at Iris.
